com.upc.repository

接口 CarRelationRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<CarRelation,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<CarRelation,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CarRelation,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<CarRelation,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface CarRelationRepository
extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<CarRelation,java.lang.Long>

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • findByUserNodeId

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[c:CAR_GOOD]->(m:Phone)where n.user_id = {userId} return p order by c.CarTime desc")
java.util.List<CarRelation> findByUserNodeId(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                      int userId)

      • findByUserAndPhone

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[c:CAR_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and  m.good_id = {goodId} return p")
CarRelation findByUserAndPhone(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                           int userId,
                                                                                                                                                           @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                           int goodId)

      • findByPhoneNodeId

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[c:CAR_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where m.good_id = {goodId} return p")
java.util.List<CarRelation> findByPhoneNodeId(@Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                int goodId)

      • createCarRelation

        @Query(value="MATCH (n:UserNode),(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and m.good_id = {goodId} create (n)-[c:CAR_GOOD{CarTime:{carTime} }]->(m)")
void createCarRelation(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                          int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                                          int goodId,
                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="carTime")
                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String carTime)

      • updateInfo

        @Query(value="MATCH (n:UserNode)-[c:CAR_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and m.good_id = {goodId} set c.CarTime = {carTime} ")
void updateInfo(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                           int userId,
                                                                                                                                                           @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                           int goodId,
                                                                                                                                                           @Param(value="carTime")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String carTime)

      • deleteRelation

        @Query(value="MATCH (n:UserNode)-[c:CAR_GOOD]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and m.good_id = {goodId} delete c")
void deleteRelation(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                             int userId,
                                                                                                                                             @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                             int goodId)
